subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Bucky Dent, a former Yankee infielder who played with Willie Randolph, told his old double-play partner to “trust your instincts and just keep doing what you’re doing.”
snippet: Bucky Dent, a former Yankee infielder who played with Willie Randolph, told his old double-play partner to “trust your instincts and just keep doing what you’re doing.”
